Maria Lopez.description: conversing about volunteering opportunities with Community Builders at Hobbs Cafe at 3pm @ <persona> Klaus Mueller
chat: Maria Lopez
Hey, Klaus! I saw you working on your paper. How's it going?
Klaus Mueller
Hey Maria! It's coming along well, thank you for asking. How about you? How was your Twitch stream or game?
Maria Lopez
It went pretty well. I had a good stream today. By the way, do you want to meet tomorrow at 3pm at Hobbs Cafe to discuss volunteering opportunities with Community Builders?
Klaus Mueller
That sounds great, Maria! I'll definitely be there at 3pm tomorrow. I'm looking forward to discussing volunteering opportunities with you.
Maria Lopez
Awesome, looking forward to it! I'll see you tomorrow at Hobbs Cafe at 3pm.
